<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Data Pattern Details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/dlp/api/v1/dss-api/data-pattern/id/{patternId}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Returns the data pattern details for the specified ID.
